weekly_top_story.headline: Polls Open in Ivory Coast as Incumbent Ouattara Seeks Fourth Term
weekly_top_story.summary: Longtime President Alassane Ouattara seeks a fourth term in Ivory Coast, highlighting challenges in democratic transitions in Africa.

stories.headline: Russian Attacks Kill 4 in Ukraine as Zelenskyy Pleads for Air Defense
stories.summary: Russian missile and drone attacks on Ukraine killed at least four people, with Zelenskyy calling for air defense support amid ongoing conflict.

stories.headline: Trump Travels to Asia Amid US Government Shutdown
stories.summary: US President Trump visits Asia while the US government shutdown continues, with meetings planned in several countries including China.

stories.headline: Tropical Storm Melissa Poised to Become a Hurricane, Threatening Caribbean
stories.summary: Tropical Storm Melissa is expected to strengthen into a hurricane, posing risks of massive rainfall and flooding in the northern Caribbean.
